mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_CODE, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_START, EVENT_END, EVENT_CONTENT FROM EVENT WHERE TRUCK_CODE = #{truck_code} ORDER BY EVENT_REG_DATE DESC
select e.event_code, m.menu_name, em.discount from menu m, event_menu em, event e where e.event_code = em.event_code and em.menu_code = m.menu_code and e.truck_code = #{truck_code}
SELECT a.event_code FROM (select event_code from event where truck_code=#{truck_code} order by event_reg_date desc) a where rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into event(event_code, truck_code, event_name, event_content, event_start, event_end, event_target, event_combinable, event_reg_date, event_payment,event_url) values('E'||to_char(sysdate,'yymmdd')||to_char(event_code_sequence.NEXTVAL,'fm000'), #{truck_code}, #{event_name}, #{event_content}, #{event_start}, #{event_end}, #{event_target}, #{event_combinable}, sysdate, #{event_payment},#{event_url})
mapper.select: select b.brandname, a.truck_code , a.event_name , a.event_code, a.event_start , a.event_end , a.event_url from event a , foodtruck b where a.truck_code = b.truck_code
